description: top image  figure at LR kneels in front of empty cupboard holding plate and feather; child behind figure holds candle; kitchen utensils on floor in foreground; woman center holds container on hip and scatters bread crumbs on table in front of her while two children at left look on; bottom image  people seated around a table, eating and holding books; figure in front turns sideways and bends down with one hand in wooden basin with water and dishes; matted and framed
title: The Search for the Leaven, and The Passover of the Portuguese Jews
